channel.title: Omfg cmon~!
channel.description:
MY SERVER IS BEING GAY!
how do i make doors open i have devolution 7 help!!

item.title: Omfg cmon~!
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Take a deep breath, breathe in and out and now read this:

Open up your doors.cfg file inside your config folder in the devolution server file.

You should see something like

door = 2594 3102 1530 -2 -3 -3 1 0 door = 2603 3082 1533 -2 -1 -1 1 0 door = 2601 9482 2559 -2 -1 -1 1 0 door = 2597 3087 1600 -1 0 0 1 0

Lets look at

door = 2597 3087 1600 -1 0 0 1 0 Shall we?

The first two numbers (2497, 3087) are the coordinates. (Definitions of coordinates on the Web: a pair of numbers and/or letters that show the exact position of a point on a map or graph)

The 3rd number is the door ID. This all should be at the top of the file.

Just make another door like this one with the ID of the closed door and its coords. Change the face and keep changing it till it appears open to opens when you click to open in teh server!

Read full topic
